data.text: Great experience for our anniversary, thanks to belsi for smooth check in. Breakfast was great and food was tasty cudos to sasvana. Hotel experience were Convenient because it's near the mall. The hotel were very clean üëçüëçüëçüëç thumbs up that's what we always check. Overall we enjoyed our stay.
data.title: Anniversary

user_location.name: San Mateo, Rizal Province, Calabarzon Region, Luzon

data.text: The people at breakfast and suhoor were so nice and helpful always asking if we need help. We were given the executive floor and we didn't even ask for it. Housekeeping was amazing and there was very nice and kind staff called sirjana she always helped us. The swimming pool was very fun for the kid's and the lifeguards were very friendly. Thank you so much sijan and the person who was at suhoor.
data.title: Amazing 4.5 star hotel near deira city centre

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Valued Guest,

Thank you for choosing Novotel is Deira City Center Dubai for your stay. We appreciate the time you took to share a detailed review of your experience with us. I am delighted to know that you enjoyed your stay with us for various reasons.

Your positive feedback is highly appreciated, and I have shared it with the team to recognize their efforts in meeting your expectations and ensuring your satisfaction.

We look forward to welcoming you back on your next visit to Dubai.

Best regards,
Sumit Gupta
Hotel Manager
owner_response.author: Sumit Gupta

data.text: It was an awesome trip and stay.  Specially for the intercontinental breakfast, the cleaning, and the employees are very kind and always ready for any kind of assistance. I will really recommend the hotel for my next trip in Dubai. Close to the Deira city center mall.
data.title: Best experience

data.text: Very nice stay, we had an amazing view from the room. The room service was super fast. The staff was super helpful and polite. Loved the pool side. Best part is it‚Äôs opposite to the Diera city centre mall, so you will have a lot of restaurants and supermarkets to explore. The metro is near by making it super convenient to travel to different areas. I am very happy with our stay at Novotel Dubai Diera City Centre. Highly recommended!!
data.title: Amazing stay

data.text: We are still at Novotel and have two more days of stay left. The hotel is one of the best place to stay in Dubai. The staff is wonderful. Ms Vasana at the dining area is a wonderful person, always helpful. All other staff including the reception, concierge too helpful. I can recommend this place to anyone looking for a comfortable and pleasant stay. We had a pool view room which I recommend to people.
data.title: Extremely wonderful stay at Novotel
